info.title: Users API
info.description: The Users microservice is concerned with viewing, deleting, and editing User

get.summary: A full list of all Users will be retrieved

200.description: Success! You were signed in and are an Admin so you got a list of all the Users.

401.description: (Not Authorized Error) User must be authenticated and be an admin to use this API call

get.summary: Get the User and all associated articles based off of the ID of a User

200.description: Successfully retrieved User based on ID. Was signed in

401.description: (Not Authorized Error) The user must be signed in and authenticated in order to retrieve their data

404.description: (Not Found Error) Couldn't find the Route, the ID likely does not exist and thus their is no User

delete.summary: Delete a certain User based off of an id

204.description: Successfully deleated User with a certain ID

401.description: (Not Authorized Error) You can only delete an account if you are signed into that account (Current user's ID matches the ID being deleted)

put.summary: Update the profile of a User who is signed in, either their profile picture or role

200.description: User's profile has successfully been updated

401.description: (Not Authorized Error) Either the user tried to edit a user they were not signed in as (another user) or a user tried to change their role without being an account with an Admin role (only admins can change roles)

404.description: (Not Found Error) The User you are trying to edit does not exist
